title: [Bug]: Status is set to away unless mouse moves over Teams for Linux window.
body:
### Can you reproduce this bug in the website/PWA?

Not applicable

### Describe the bug

My status automatically gets set to idle/away (yellow) even when I am actively using my mouse and keyboard. My status only gets set to available (green) when I  move my mouse over Teams for Linux.

### What package are you using?

AppImage on Ubuntu 24.04.2 LTS.

### Version

2.0.4

### Reproduction steps

```markdown
1. Start Teams for Linux AppImage.
2. Use my computer as normal, not hovering over or giving focus to Teams for Linux window.
3. Status goes idle/away (yellow)
4. Move mouse over Teams for Linux window (window focus is not needed) so it detects activity.
```

### Expected Behavior
Teams for Linux previously detected that I was active, regardless of whether or not I was actively using the app or had my mouse over the app.
